g.text: What techniques can we use to tackle problems without changing CMS?
1 Build on top of the existing UI
Likely to be a single iteration of a service
Likely to be the whole UI or not
An interim data extract method for Dashboards
A way to generate Test Data
They should only be temporary, so we keep a count
Core to Polaris and Email Automation.
Maximum extent would be the full scope of CMS, but
we might not need all of that
5 Create an API “on top” of CMS server
a new display for case data, a search tool and a redaction
The approach for Future MI and Operational Dashboards. F
Maximum extent would be a full copy of CMS data
and files Future MI should ask for it all as a single CR.
The Email Automation Service will go live for North and South London areas. The

messages within them. Receipt of Police Files

13 Add to a single User Homepage
